verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Was Led Up <S%G321><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> To Be Tempted <S%G3985><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil. <S%G1228><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Fasted <S%G3522><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nights <S%G3571><s%> Forty, <S%G5062><s%> Afterwards <S%G5305><s%> He Hungered. <S%G3983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tempter <S%G3985><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Speak <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3037><s%> These Stones <S%G3778><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> May Become. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> ' By <S%G1909><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> Shall Live <S%G2198><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> By <S%G1909><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> Going Out <S%G1607><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Takes <S%G3880><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sets <S%G2476><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Edge <S%G4419><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Down : <S%G2736><s%> <S%G1125><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For It Has Been Written, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> To His Angels <S%G846><s%> He Will Give Charge <S%G1781><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> Their Hands <S%G5495><s%> Shall They Bear <S%G142><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Thou Strike <S%G4350><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Thy Foot. <S%G4675><s%>

Said <S%G5346><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%> Shalt Not Tempt <S%G1598><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Thy. <S%G4675><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> Takes <S%G3880><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Mountain <S%G3735><s%> High <S%G5308><s%> Exceedingly, <S%G3029><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shows <S%G1166><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdoms <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Their Glory, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Will I Give <S%G1325><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Falling Down <S%G4098><s%> Thou Wilt Worship <S%G4352><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Get Thee Away, <S%G5217><s%> Satan; <S%G4567><s%> <S%G1125><s%>, For It Has Been Written, <S%G1063><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Thy God <S%G4675><s%> Shalt Thou Worship, <S%G4352><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> Shalt Thou Serve. <S%G3000><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Leaves <S%G863><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil, <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ministered <S%G1247><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G191><s%> But Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Was Delivered Up, <S%G3860><s%> He Withdrew <S%G402><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee : <S%G1056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Left <S%G2641><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Dwelt <S%G2730><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is On The Seaside, <S%G3864><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Borders <S%G3725><s%> Of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Naphtali, <S%G3508><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Land <S%G1093><s%> N-VSF Of Zebulun 2194 N-PRI And 2532 CONJ Land 1093 N-NSF 1093 N-VSF, Of Naphtali, 3508 N-PRI Way 3598 N-ASF Of The Sea, 2281 N-GSF Beyond 4008 ADV The 3588 T-GSM Jordan, 2446 N-GSM Galilee 1056 N-NSF 1056 N-VSF Of The 3588 T-GPN Nations, 1484 N-GPN

The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Has Seen <S%G1492><s%> A Light <S%G5457><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Those Which <S%G3588><s%> Were Sitting <S%G2521><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Country <S%G5561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shadow <S%G4639><s%> Of Death, <S%G2288><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Has Sprung Up <S%G393><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

From <S%G575><s%> That Time <S%G5119><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Say, <S%G3004><s%> Repent; <S%G3340><s%> <S%G1448><s%> For Has Drawn Near <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G4043><s%> And Walking <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%>, Brothers, <S%G80><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G3004><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> Casting <S%G906><s%> A Large Net <S%G293><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For They Were <S%G1063><s%> Fishers : <S%G231><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Make <S%G4160><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Fishers <S%G231><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nets, <S%G1350><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone On <S%G4260><s%> Thence, <S%G1564><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%>, Brothers, <S%G80><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Their Father, <S%G846><s%> Mending <S%G2675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Nets <S%G1350><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Called <S%G2564><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Their Father <S%G846><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went About <S%G4013><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Their Synagogues, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom, <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Healing <S%G2323><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Disease <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Bodily Weakness <S%G3119><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G565><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fame <S%G189><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Syria. <S%G4947><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2560><s%> Who Were Ill, <S%G2192><s%> By Various <S%G4164><s%> Diseases <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Torments <S%G931><s%> Oppressed, <S%G4912><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Possessed By Demons, <S%G1139><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lunatics, <S%G4583><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Paralytics; <S%G3885><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Healed <S%G2323><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Decapolis <S%G1179><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beyond <S%G4008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>
